name: Dwarven SteamJunk
description:
Dwarves built factories across islands and abandoned them. Your task is to utilize every piece of junk they left.

You weapons are the shovel and knowledge of writing sigils.
With shovel you can dig the ground, cut powerlines, smash buildings, disarm traps and write sigils.
With sigils you can cast light and levitation, destroy entire buildings in one shot and teleport yourself home when the task is done.

WASD/Arrow keys to move,
M to enter dig mode,
Space to jump or dig.

Island loading can take a long time, but it will load eventually =\
Made for LOWREZJAM2022
